INTRO_ABOUT: Hi, my name is Joana, and as you might have guessed, I love challenges. So, I’ve prepared a little quiz before sharing more about me. You can choose between solving a puzzle or answering a small math question. Have fun!
INTRO_HOME: This site was built using the Angular 19 framework to create a more interactive and personal version of my resume. Here, you can learn about my professional journey and explore the technical side of the project.
ABOUT_ME_TEXT: So, my name is Joana, I live in Portugal, and I graduated with a master’s degree in Physics Engineering from the Faculty of Sciences of the University of Lisbon. After my studies, I couldn’t find opportunities in the field, so I decided to pursue programming, which allowed me to complement my knowledge with technology. Each project has given me the chance to learn new tools, so I decided to apply some of my knowledge to create this online resume. Outside of work, I enjoy traveling (who doesn’t?), playing escape games, gardening, and testing new gadgets. Want to know more? Then reach out to me on LinkedIn.
QUOTE_1: Technology is best when it brings people together. — Matt Mullenweg
QUOTE_2: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving. — Albert Einstein
QUOTE_3: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. — Eleanor Roosevelt
